title: How do I disable key press vibration?
answer:
If you are using Huawei Input Method, touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111080) > Basic settings, and turn off Vibrate on keypress. 

 [Go to Settings > Language & input > Huawei Input Method > Virtual keyboard settings, and turn off Vibrate on keypress.]()
